text: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.
author: Ogden Nash

text: Family involvement is a valuable thing and playing together actively can be the '90s version of it. Instead of just watching, you can do it together... something we don't spend enough time on. We can motivate and excite each other about fitness.
author: Alan Thicke

text: Education, like neurosis, begins at home.
author: Milton Sapirstein

text: I feel very blessed to have two wonderful, healthy children who keep me completely grounded, sane and throw up on my shoes just before I go to an awards show just so I know to keep it real.
author: Reese Witherspoon

text: No one knows his true character until he has run out of gas, purchased something on the installment plan and raised an adolescent.
author: Marcelene Cox
